attributes.action: change the England football kit to it's native red & white only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nearly every other international team have their kits (both home & away) made out of the colours depicted by their national flag. Navy blue has never been part of the England flag, so it should not be part of the England HOME kit especially. Bring back the all white home kit, or white with red shorts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
